name: Hawkwing
description:
Hawkwing focus to recreate the feeling of late 80's / early 90's arcade and consoles shmup/shoot'em up, with lot of action, colorful 2d low resolution sprites, medium sampling quality sounds and a catchy soundtrack emulated on those old chips.

I release it as a free demo, and depending on the hype, i'll consider making a full game or not.

The game is built in C# with the Monogame framework.

You can follow Los Geekos Studio on Twitter, Facebook, IndieDB or TIG Source for updates on the project.

The project is currently on hold, and won't get any further for the moment.

Update 02/2017: Demo2 (1.1) released: lot of fixes, some game balanced, directinput to handle every controllers, configurable CRT/scanline effect, etc.

Update 04/2017: Demo 1.2 released: updated to Monogame 3.6 and released Mac OSX & Linux versions.
